title: Golden sheep

properties.name: description
properties.value: Golden sheep are animals located in the enclosure with the golden tree. It is guarded by Lalli who will give the player a golden fleece in exchange for making him rock soup during The Fremennik Trials. The sheep cannot be sheared by the player.

Golden sheep are animals located in the enclosure with the golden tree. It is guarded by Lalli who will give the player a golden fleece in exchange for making him rock soup during The Fremennik Trials. The sheep cannot be sheared by the player.

Changes[edit | edit source]
